generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, which is the primary surface for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and some potted plants, designated for pedestrian use.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial establishments like "Hotel Garni Drive-In" and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalk and in front of some buildings, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and street, appearing partly cloudy.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating "120m" and "Nur noch 1,5 km" is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- motorcycle: Several motorcycles are parked on the left side of the road, near the storefronts.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the sides of the road, including a black Audi SUV and a dark-colored SUV on the left side.
- pole: A pole is visible on the right side of the road, supporting the traffic sign.
- terrain: Some patches of grass are visible along the sidewalk and in small areas between the buildings.
